quotes.quote: Rise up, start fresh, see the bright opportunity in each new day.

quotes.quote: Good morning! Have a positive mindset as you begin this day. It will make a difference.
quotes.author: Unknown

quotes.quote: Every morning is a new beginning, a fresh start to embrace the opportunities that come your way.
quotes.author: Unknown

quotes.quote: Today is a new day. Don't let the troubles of yesterday weigh you down. Instead, focus on the possibilities of today.

quotes.quote: Wake up with determination. Go to bed with satisfaction.
quotes.author: Unknown

quotes.quote: Good morning! Start your day with a smile and positive thoughts. It sets the tone for a productive day ahead.
quotes.author: Unknown

quotes.quote: The morning shines upon everyone the same. Its beauty is for rich or poor alike. You are not less than anyone else in the eyes of the morning.

quotes.quote: The morning is a reminder that you have a purpose in this world. Embrace it and make the most of it.

quotes.quote: Good morning! Start your day with a grateful heart and a positive mindset. It will make a world of difference.

quotes.quote: Every morning is a fresh beginning. Take a deep breath, smile, and start again.

quotes.quote: Good morning! Today is another opportunity to make a difference, to shine your light, and to be the best version of yourself.

quotes.quote: Good morning! May your day be filled with joy, love, and endless blessings.

quotes.quote: Each morning is a new chapter in your life. Fill it with love, positivity, and gratitude.

quotes.quote: Good morning! Rise and shine, for a new day is here. Embrace it with open arms and make the most of it.

quotes.quote: Love is composed of a single soul inhabiting two bodies.
quotes.author: Aristotle

quotes.quote: The best thing to hold onto in life is each other.
quotes.author: Audrey Hepburn

quotes.quote: Love is not about how many days, weeks, or months you've been together, it's all about how much you love each other every day.
quotes.author: Unknown

quotes.quote: Love is friendship that has caught fire.
quotes.author: Ann Landers

quotes.quote: Being deeply loved by someone gives you strength, while loving someone deeply gives you courage.
quotes.author: Lao Tzu

quotes.quote: Love is when the other person's happiness is more important than your own.
quotes.author: H. Jackson Brown Jr.

quotes.quote: Love is a game that two can play and both can win.
quotes.author: Eva Gabor

quotes.quote: The best and most beautiful things in this world cannot be seen or even heard, but must be felt with the heart.
quotes.author: Helen Keller

quotes.quote: Love doesn't make the world go round. Love is what makes the ride worthwhile.
quotes.author: Franklin P. Jones

quotes.quote: The greatest happiness of life is the conviction that we are loved; loved for ourselves, or rather, loved in spite of ourselves.
quotes.author: Victor Hugo

quotes.quote: Love is like the wind, you can't see it but you can feel it.
quotes.author: Nicholas Sparks

quotes.quote: Love is the answer, and you know that for sure; Love is a flower, you've got to let it grow.
quotes.author: John Lennon

quotes.quote: Love is an untamed force. When we try to control it, it destroys us. When we try to imprison it, it enslaves us. When we try to understand it, it leaves us feeling lost and confused.
quotes.author: Paulo Coelho

quotes.quote: I saw that you were perfect, and so I loved you. Then I saw that you were not perfect and I loved you even more.
quotes.author: Angelita Lim

quotes.quote: If I know what love is, it is because of you.
quotes.author: Hermann Hesse

quotes.quote: Love is a promise; love is a souvenir, once given never forgotten, never let it disappear.
quotes.author: John Lennon

quotes.quote: Love is the only force capable of transforming an enemy into a friend.

quotes.quote: It's sad when someone you know becomes someone you knew.
quotes.author: Henry Rollins

quotes.quote: The saddest thing about betrayal is that it never comes from your enemies.
quotes.author: Unknown

quotes.quote: Tears come from the heart and not from the brain.

quotes.quote: The worst kind of sad is not being able to explain why.

quotes.quote: The only thing sadder than a liar is a liar that's also a hypocrite!

quotes.quote: It's sad when you realize you aren't as important to someone as you thought you were.

quotes.quote: Behind every sweet smile, there is a bitter sadness that no one can ever see and feel.

quotes.quote: It's sad when someone you care about becomes a stranger.

quotes.quote: The greatest pain that comes from love is loving someone you can never have.

quotes.quote: When you're happy, you enjoy the music. When you're sad, you understand the lyrics.

quotes.quote: The saddest thing is to be a minute to someone when you've made them your eternity.

quotes.quote: The saddest summary of a life contains three descriptions: could have, might have, and should have.

quotes.quote: Sometimes it's better to be alone. Nobody can hurt you.

quotes.quote: Sometimes, you just have to smile, pretend everything's okay, hold back the tears, and just walk away.

quotes.quote: Birthdays are a new start, a fresh beginning, and a time to pursue new endeavors with new goals. Move forward with confidence and courage. You are a very special person. May today and all of your days be amazing!

quotes.quote: Today you are you! That is truer than true! There is no one alive who is you-er than you!
quotes.author: Dr. Seuss

quotes.quote: A birthday is like a new year and my wish for you is a great year full of happiness and sunshine!
quotes.author: Catherine Pulsifer

quotes.quote: Age is a case of mind over matter. If you don't mind, it doesn't matter.
quotes.author: Satchel Paige

quotes.quote: Don't just count your years, make your years count.
quotes.author: George Meredith

quotes.quote: Wishing you a day filled with love, good times, loads of presents, and a calorie-bomb birthday cake. Happy birthday!
quotes.author: Unknown

quotes.quote: You are never too old to set another goal or to dream a new dream.
quotes.author: C.S. Lewis

quotes.quote: It's your birthday, and you can cry if you want to. But hey, why not laugh, dance, and enjoy yourself? You deserve it!
quotes.author: Unknown

quotes.quote: Birthdays are nature's way of telling us to eat more cake.
quotes.author: Unknown

quotes.quote: The greatest gift that you can give to others is the gift of unconditional love and acceptance.
quotes.author: Brian Tracy

quotes.quote: Today is the oldest you have been and the youngest you will ever be. Make the most of it!
quotes.author: Nicky Gumbel

quotes.quote: Don't count the years, make the years count.
quotes.author: George Meredith

quotes.quote: Youth is the gift of nature, but age is a work of art.
quotes.author: Stanislaw Jerzy Lec

quotes.quote: The more you praise and celebrate your life, the more there is in life to celebrate.
quotes.author: Oprah Winfrey

quotes.quote: The best way to predict your future is to create it.
quotes.author: Peter Drucker

quotes.quote: With age, comes wisdom. With wisdom, comes courage.
quotes.author: Unknown

quotes.quote: Happy birthday! Don't just count your years, make your years count.
quotes.author: George Meredith

quotes.quote: It's not the years in your life that count. It's the life in your years.
quotes.author: Abraham Lincoln

quotes.quote: Growing old is mandatory, but growing up is optional.
quotes.author: Walt Disney

quotes.quote: Today you have added another candle of knowledge and wisdom to your life. May it give you the power to enlighten the whole world. On your birthday, I wish you joy and happiness.
quotes.author: Debasish Mridha

quotes.quote: Do not regret growing older. It is a privilege denied to many.
quotes.author: Unknown

quotes.quote: Don't just count your years, make your years count.
quotes.author: Ernest Meyers

quotes.quote: Today you are another year older, and we know how fast time flies as we get older, therefore, live each day and be happy!
quotes.author: Kate Summers

quotes.quote: Age is not how old you are, but how many years of fun you've had.
quotes.author: Matt Maldre

quotes.quote: A birthday is not a day to fear. It is a day to celebrate and look forward to the coming year.
quotes.author: Byron Pulsifer

quotes.quote: Every year on your birthday, you get a chance to start new.
quotes.author: Sammy Hagar

quotes.quote: Today is a perfect day to tell you that you are a wonderful friend. Happy birthday!
quotes.author: Unknown

quotes.quote: Don't just count your years, make your years count.
quotes.author: Ernest Meyers

quotes.quote: Count your blessings, not your wrinkles.
quotes.author: Unknown

quotes.quote: May your birthday be filled with sunshine, smiles, laughter, love, and cheer.
quotes.author: Unknown

quotes.quote: The older I get, the more I realize that I am still a little younger than you. Happy birthday!

quotes.quote: A true friend is someone who is always there for you, during both the good times and the bad times.
quotes.author: Unknown

quotes.quote: Friendship is born at that moment when one person says to another, 'What! You too? I thought I was the only one.'
quotes.author: C.S. Lewis

quotes.quote: A friend is someone who understands your past, believes in your future, and accepts you just the way you are.
quotes.author: Unknown

quotes.quote: A true friend is the greatest of all blessings and the one that we take the least thought about acquiring.
quotes.author: Francois de La Rochefoucauld

quotes.quote: Friendship is the only cement that will ever hold the world together.
quotes.author: Woodrow Wilson

quotes.quote: A real friend is one who walks in when the rest of the world walks out.
quotes.author: Walter Winchell

quotes.quote: A friend is someone who knows all about you and still loves you.
quotes.author: Elbert Hubbard

quotes.quote: A successful marriage requires falling in love many times, always with the same person.
quotes.author: Mignon McLaughlin

quotes.quote: Love is not about how many days, months, or years you have been together. Love is about how much you love each other every single day.
quotes.author: Unknown

quotes.quote: The secret of a happy marriage is finding the right person. You know they're right if you love to be with them all the time.
quotes.author: Julia Child

quotes.quote: Anniversaries are like birthdays: occasions to celebrate and to think ahead, usually among friends with whom one shares not only the past but also the future.
quotes.author: Zbigniew Brzezinski

quotes.quote: Chains do not hold a marriage together. It is threads, hundreds of tiny threads, which sew people together through the years.
quotes.author: Simone Signoret

quotes.quote: An anniversary is a reminder as to why you love and married this person.
quotes.author: Zoe Foster Blake

quotes.quote: The best thing to hold onto in life is each other.
quotes.author: Audrey Hepburn

quotes.quote: True love stories never have endings.
quotes.author: Richard Bach

quotes.quote: The greatest thing you'll ever learn is to love and be loved in return.
quotes.author: Nat King Cole

quotes.quote: A wedding anniversary is the celebration of love, trust, partnership, tolerance, and tenacity. The order varies for any given year.
quotes.author: Paul Sweeney

quotes.quote: The secret to a happy marriage is if you can be at peace with someone within four walls, if you are content because the one you love is near to you, either upstairs or downstairs, or in the same room, and you feel that warmth that you don't find very often, then that is what love is all about.
quotes.author: Bruce Forsyth

quotes.quote: The bonds of matrimony are like any other bonds - they mature slowly.
quotes.author: Peter De Vries

quotes.quote: A wedding anniversary is the celebration of love, trust, partnership, tolerance, and tenacity. The order varies for any given year.
quotes.author: Paul Sweeney

quotes.quote: A successful marriage isn't the union of two perfect people. It's that of two imperfect people who have learned the value of forgiveness and grace.
quotes.author: Darlene Schacht

quotes.quote: Christmas isn't a season. It's a feeling.
quotes.author: Edna Ferber

quotes.quote: Christmas waves a magic wand over this world, and behold, everything is softer and more beautiful.
quotes.author: Norman Vincent Peale

quotes.quote: Christmas is the day that holds all time together.
quotes.author: Alexander Smith

quotes.quote: Christmas is a season not only of rejoicing but of reflection.
quotes.author: Winston Churchill

quotes.quote: Christmas is not a time nor a season, but a state of mind. To cherish peace and goodwill, to be plenteous in mercy, is to have the real spirit of Christmas.
quotes.author: Calvin Coolidge

quotes.quote: Christmas is the spirit of giving without a thought of getting. It is happiness because we see joy in people. It is forgetting self and finding time for others. It is discarding the meaningless and stressing the true values.
quotes.author: Thomas S. Monson

quotes.quote: Christmas, my child, is love in action. Every time we love, every time we give, it's Christmas.
quotes.author: Dale Evans

quotes.quote: Christmas is doing a little something extra for someone.
quotes.author: Charles M. Schulz

quotes.quote: Success is not final, failure is not fatal: It is the courage to continue that counts.
quotes.author: Winston Churchill

quotes.quote: Failure is simply the opportunity to begin again, this time more intelligently.
quotes.author: Henry Ford

quotes.quote: Success is stumbling from failure to failure with no loss of enthusiasm.
quotes.author: Winston Churchill

quotes.quote: Failure is the condiment that gives success its flavor.
quotes.author: Truman Capote

quotes.quote: There is only one thing that makes a dream impossible to achieve: the fear of failure.
quotes.author: Paulo Coelho

quotes.quote: Don't be afraid to fail. Be afraid not to try.
quotes.author: Michael Jordan

quotes.quote: Failure is not the opposite of success; it's part of success.
quotes.author: Arianna Huffington

quotes.quote: The only real mistake is the one from which we learn nothing.
quotes.author: Henry Ford

quotes.quote: Success is not built on success. It's built on failure. It's built on frustration. Sometimes it's built on catastrophe.
quotes.author: Sumner Redstone

quotes.quote: Failure should be our teacher, not our undertaker. Failure is delay, not defeat. It is a temporary detour, not a dead end.
quotes.author: Denis Waitley

quotes.quote: It's fine to celebrate success but it is more important to heed the lessons of failure.
quotes.author: Bill Gates

quotes.quote: The greatest glory in living lies not in never falling, but in rising every time we fall.
quotes.author: Nelson Mandela

quotes.quote: Failures, repeated failures, are finger posts on the road to achievement. One fails forward toward success.

quotes.quote: Failure is the opportunity to begin again more intelligently.
quotes.author: Henry Ford

quotes.quote: You miss 100% of the shots you don't take.
quotes.author: Wayne Gretzky

quotes.quote: Success is not the absence of failure; it's the persistence through failure.
quotes.author: Aisha Tyler

quotes.quote: Failure is an event, not a person. Yesterday ended last night.
quotes.author: Zig Ziglar

quotes.quote: I can accept failure, everyone fails at something. But I can't accept not trying.
quotes.author: Michael Jordan

quotes.quote: I have not failed. I've just found 10,000 ways that won't work.

quotes.quote: Failure is success if we learn from it.
quotes.author: Malcolm Forbes

quotes.quote: Our greatest glory is not in never falling, but in rising every time we fall.

quotes.quote: Only those who dare to fail greatly can ever achieve greatly.

quotes.quote: Failure is not falling down but refusing to get up.

quotes.quote: The only real failure in life is not to be true to the best one knows.
quotes.author: Buddha

quotes.quote: You build on failure. You use it as a stepping stone. Close the door on the past. You don't try to forget the mistakes, but you don't dwell on it. You don't let it have any of your energy, or any of your time, or any of your space.
quotes.author: Johnny Cash

quotes.quote: If you fell down yesterday, stand up today.

quotes.quote: The phoenix must burn to emerge.
quotes.author: Janet Fitch

quotes.quote: Failure is a bruise, not a tattoo.
quotes.author: Jon Sinclair

quotes.quote: Failure is a stepping stone to success.
quotes.author: Charles Darwin

quotes.quote: Sometimes by losing a battle you find a new way to win the war.
quotes.author: Donald Trump

quotes.quote: The greatest mistake you can make in life is to be continually fearing you will make one.
quotes.author: Elbert Hubbard

quotes.quote: Mistakes are the portals of discovery.
quotes.author: James Joyce

quotes.quote: You must make a decision that you are going to move on. It won't happen automatically. You will have to rise up and say, 'I don’t care how hard this is, I don’t care how disappointed I am, I’m not going to let this get the best of me. I’m moving on with my life.'
quotes.author: Joel Osteen

quotes.quote: Failure is simply the opportunity to begin again, this time more intelligently.

quotes.quote: Success is not the absence of failure; it's the persistence through failure.

quotes.quote: Success is not the key to happiness. Happiness is the key to success. If you love what you are doing, you will be successful.

quotes.quote: I can't give you a sure-fire formula for success, but I can give you a formula for failure: try to please everybody all the time.

quotes.quote: The only limit to our realization of tomorrow will be our doubts of today.
quotes.author: Franklin D. Roosevelt

quotes.quote: Failure is not a single, cataclysmic event. You don't fail overnight. Instead, failure is a few errors in judgment, repeated every day.

quotes.quote: I don't know the key to success, but the key to failure is trying to please everybody.
quotes.author: Bill Cosby

quotes.quote: You have to be able to accept failure to get better.

quotes.quote: The difference between a successful person and others is not a lack of strength, not a lack of knowledge, but rather a lack of will.

quotes.quote: You're not obligated to win. You're obligated to keep trying. To the best you can do everyday.
quotes.author: Jason Mraz

quotes.quote: Success is not built on success. It's built on failure. It's built on frustration. Sometimes it's built on catastrophe.

quotes.quote: There is no failure except in no longer trying.

quotes.quote: The only way to do great work is to love what you do. If you haven't found it yet, keep looking. Don't settle.

quotes.quote: Jealousy is the fear of comparison.

quotes.quote: Jealousy is the jaundice of the soul.

quotes.quote: Jealousy is the art of counting someone else's blessings instead of your own.
quotes.author: Unknown

quotes.quote: Jealousy is a disease, love is a healthy condition. The immature mind often mistakes one for the other, or assumes that the greater the love, the greater the jealousy - in fact, they are almost incompatible; one emotion hardly leaves room for the other.
quotes.author: Robert A. Heinlein

quotes.quote: Jealousy is both reasonable and belongs to reasonable men, while envy is base and belongs to the base, for the one makes himself get good things by jealousy, while the other does not allow his neighbour to have them through envy.

quotes.quote: Jealousy is a wasted emotion.
quotes.author: Unknown

quotes.quote: Jealousy is the dragon in paradise; the hell of heaven; and the most bitter of the emotions because associated with the sweetest.

quotes.quote: Jealousy is never satisfied with anything short of an omniscience that would detect the subtlest fold of the heart.

quotes.quote: Jealousy is all the fun you think they had.
quotes.author: Erica Jong

quotes.quote: Jealousy is simply and clearly the fear that you do not have value. Jealousy scans for evidence to prove the point - that others will be preferred and rewarded more than you. There is only one alternative - self-value. If you cannot love yourself, you will not believe that you are loved. You will always think it's a mistake or luck. Take your eyes off others and turn the scanner within. Find the seeds of your jealousy, clear the old voices and experiences. Put all the energy into building your personal and emotional security. Then you will be the one others envy, and you can remember the pain and reach out to them.
quotes.author: Jennifer James

quotes.quote: Jealousy is a disease, love is a healthy condition. The immature mind often mistakes one for the other, or assumes that the greater the love, the greater the jealousy - in fact, they are almost incompatible; one emotion hardly leaves room for the other.
quotes.author: Robert A. Heinlein

quotes.quote: Jealousy is the fear of comparison.
quotes.author: Max Frisch

quotes.quote: Jealousy is the jaundice of the soul.
quotes.author: John Dryden

quotes.quote: Jealousy is the tribute mediocrity pays to genius.
quotes.author: Fulton J. Sheen

quotes.quote: Jealousy is the art of counting someone else's blessings instead of your own.

quotes.quote: Meditation is the ultimate mobile device; you can use it anywhere, anytime, unobtrusively.
quotes.author: Sharon Salzberg

quotes.quote: The mind is everything. What you think, you become.
quotes.author: Buddha

quotes.quote: In the midst of movement and chaos, keep stillness inside of you.
quotes.author: Deepak Chopra

quotes.quote: Silence is not an absence but a presence.
quotes.author: Anne D. LeClaire

quotes.quote: Don't just do something, sit there!
quotes.author: Unknown

quotes.quote: You should sit in meditation for twenty minutes every day, unless you're too busy. Then you should sit for an hour.
quotes.author: Zen proverb

quotes.quote: The quieter you become, the more you can hear.
quotes.author: Ram Dass

quotes.quote: If you want to conquer the anxiety of life, live in the moment, live in the breath.
quotes.author: Amit Ray

quotes.quote: Meditation is not a way of making your mind quiet. It's a way of entering into the quiet that's already there.
quotes.author: Deepak Chopra

quotes.quote: In the stillness of the mind, I saw myself as I am: unbound.
quotes.author: Sri Nisargadatta Maharaj

quotes.quote: Your goal is not to battle with the mind but to witness the mind.
quotes.author: Swami Muktananda

quotes.quote: The more regularly and the more deeply you meditate, the sooner you will find yourself acting always from a center of peace.
quotes.author: J. Donald Walters

quotes.quote: Meditation is not spacing-out or running away. In fact, it is being totally honest with ourselves.
quotes.author: Kathleen McDonald

quotes.quote: Meditation is the soul's perspective glass.
quotes.author: Owen Feltham

quotes.quote: Meditation practice isn't about trying to throw ourselves away and become something better. It's about befriending who we are already.
quotes.author: Pema Chödrön

quotes.quote: Meditation is like a gym in which you develop the powerful mental muscles of calm and insight.
quotes.author: Ajahn Brahm

quotes.quote: Mindfulness helps you go home to the present. And every time you go there and recognize a condition of happiness that you have, happiness comes.
quotes.author: Thich Nhat Hanh

quotes.quote: When meditation is mastered, the mind is unwavering like the flame of a lamp in a windless place.
quotes.author: Bhagavad Gita

quotes.quote: Meditation is the tongue of the soul and the language of our spirit.
quotes.author: Jeremy Taylor

quotes.quote: Meditation is the secret of all growth in spiritual life and knowledge.
quotes.author: James Allen

quotes.quote: Meditation brings wisdom; lack of meditation leaves ignorance. Know well what leads you forward and what holds you back, and choose the path that leads to wisdom.
quotes.author: Buddha

quotes.quote: The gift of learning to meditate is the greatest gift you can give yourself in this lifetime.
quotes.author: Sogyal Rinpoche

quotes.quote: Meditation is not a means to an end. It is both the means and the end.
quotes.author: Jiddu Krishnamurti

quotes.quote: Meditation is not a way of making your mind quiet. It's a way of entering into the quiet that's already there—buried under the 50,000 thoughts the average person thinks every day.
quotes.author: Deepak Chopra

quotes.quote: In meditation, silence grows like a green plant, unfolding its many petals.
quotes.author: Paul Brunton

quotes.quote: Meditation is the dissolution of thoughts in Eternal awareness or Pure consciousness without objectification, knowing without thinking, merging finitude in infinity.
quotes.author: Voltaire

quotes.quote: Meditation is listening to the Divine within.
quotes.author: Edgar Cayce

quotes.quote: Meditation is the secret of all growth in spiritual life and knowledge.

quotes.quote: Thank you for your kindness and support.

quotes.quote: Thank you for always believing in me.
quotes.author: Unknown

quotes.quote: Gratitude is not only the greatest of virtues but the parent of all others.

quotes.quote: Love is not finding someone to live with, it's finding someone you can't live without.
quotes.author: Unknown

quotes.quote: In a sea of people, my eyes will always search for you.
quotes.author: Unknown

quotes.quote: Love is when the other person's happiness is more important than your own.
quotes.author: H. Jackson Brown Jr.

quotes.quote: You don't love someone for their looks, or their clothes, or for their fancy car, but because they sing a song only you can hear.
quotes.author: Oscar Wilde

quotes.quote: I love you without knowing how, or when, or from where. I love you simply, without problems or pride: I love you in this way because I do not know any other way of loving but this.
quotes.author: Pablo Neruda

quotes.quote: If I had a flower for every time I thought of you, I could walk in my garden forever.
quotes.author: Alfred Lord Tennyson

quotes.quote: Love is composed of a single soul inhabiting two bodies.
quotes.author: Aristotle

quotes.quote: I love you not only for what you are, but for what I am when I am with you.
quotes.author: Roy Croft

quotes.quote: Love is like the wind, you can't see it but you can feel it.
quotes.author: Nicholas Sparks

quotes.quote: You are my heart, my life, my one and only thought.
quotes.author: Arthur Conan Doyle

quotes.quote: Love is a game that two can play and both win.
quotes.author: Eva Gabor

quotes.quote: I have decided to stick with love. Hate is too great a burden to bear.
quotes.author: Martin Luther King Jr.

quotes.quote: Love is when you meet someone who tells you something new about yourself.
quotes.author: Andre Breton

quotes.quote: The best thing to hold onto in life is each other.
quotes.author: Audrey Hepburn

quotes.quote: If I know what love is, it is because of you.
quotes.author: Hermann Hesse

quotes.quote: Being deeply loved by someone gives you strength, while loving someone deeply gives you courage.
quotes.author: Lao Tzu

quotes.quote: Love is a friendship set to music.
quotes.author: Joseph Campbell

quotes.quote: Love is the greatest refreshment in life.
quotes.author: Pablo Picasso

quotes.quote: Love isn't something you find. Love is something that finds you.
quotes.author: Loretta Young

quotes.quote: Love is the only force capable of transforming an enemy into a friend.
quotes.author: Martin Luther King Jr.

quotes.quote: I am in you and you in me, mutual in divine love.
quotes.author: William Blake

quotes.quote: A successful marriage requires falling in love many times, always with the same person.
quotes.author: Mignon McLaughlin

quotes.quote: Love is like a beautiful flower which I may not touch, but whose fragrance makes the garden a place of delight just the same.
quotes.author: Helen Keller

quotes.quote: You know you're in love when you can't fall asleep because reality is finally better than your dreams.
quotes.author: Dr. Seuss

quotes.quote: Love is a language spoken by everyone, but understood only by the heart.
quotes.author: Unknown

quotes.quote: Love is the greatest gift that one generation can leave to another.
quotes.author: Richard Garnett

quotes.quote: Love is not only something you feel, it is something you do.
quotes.author: David Wilkerson

quotes.quote: Love is a canvas furnished by nature and embroidered by imagination.
quotes.author: Voltaire

quotes.quote: Love is when you look into someone's eyes and see everything you need.
quotes.author: Unknown

quotes.quote: Love is the master key that opens the gates of happiness.
quotes.author: Oliver Wendell Holmes Sr.

quotes.quote: The best and most beautiful things in this world cannot be seen or even heard, but must be felt with the heart.
quotes.author: Helen Keller

quotes.quote: Love is an irresistible desire to be irresistibly desired.
quotes.author: Robert Frost

quotes.quote: Love is a fire. But whether it is going to warm your hearth or burn down your house, you can never tell.
quotes.author: Joan Crawford

quotes.quote: The best love is the kind that awakens the soul; that makes us reach for more, that plants the fire in our hearts and brings peace to our minds.
quotes.author: Nicholas Sparks

quotes.quote: Love is the flower you've got to let grow.
quotes.author: John Lennon

quotes.quote: Love is the poetry of the senses.
quotes.author: Honoré de Balzac

quotes.quote: The art of love is largely the art of persistence.
quotes.author: Albert Ellis

quotes.quote: Love is an act of endless forgiveness, a tender look which becomes a habit.
quotes.author: Peter Ustinov

quotes.quote: Love is an emotion experienced by the many and enjoyed by the few.
quotes.author: George Jean Nathan

quotes.quote: Love is the greatest gift that God has given us. It's free.
quotes.author: Taraji P. Henson

quotes.quote: Love is a game that two can play and both win.
quotes.author: Eva Gabor

quotes.quote: The best thing to hold onto in life is each other.
quotes.author: Audrey Hepburn

quotes.quote: Love is the beauty of the soul.
quotes.author: Saint Augustine

quotes.quote: Love is like a virus. It can happen to anybody at any time.
quotes.author: Maya Angelou

quotes.quote: Love is a friendship that has caught fire.
quotes.author: Ann Landers

quotes.quote: Love is the only force capable of transforming an enemy into a friend.
quotes.author: Martin Luther King Jr.

quotes.quote: Love is a promise, love is a souvenir, once given never forgotten, never let it disappear.
quotes.author: John Lennon

quotes.quote: Love is not about how many days, months, or years you've been together. Love is about how much you love each other every single day.
quotes.author: Unknown

quotes.quote: Love is like a good coffee, sweet, strong, and keeps you up all night.
quotes.author: Jasleen Kaur Gumber

quotes.quote: Love is the only gold.
quotes.author: Alfred Lord Tennyson

quotes.quote: Good night. Sleep tight. Wake up bright.
quotes.author: Unknown

quotes.quote: Night is a wonderful opportunity to take rest, to forgive, to dream, to smile, and to get ready for all the battles that you have to fight tomorrow.
quotes.author: Unknown

quotes.quote: Sleeping is nice. You forget about everything for a little while.
quotes.author: Unknown

quotes.quote: Goodnight. Let the stars light the way to where your dreams can be found awaiting your arrival.
quotes.author: Unknown

quotes.quote: The night is not forever, but our love is. Good night, my sweetheart.
quotes.author: Unknown

quotes.quote: The best bridge between despair and hope is a good night's sleep.
quotes.author: Unknown

quotes.quote: Day is over, night has come. Today is gone, what's done is done. Embrace your dreams, through the night. Tomorrow comes with a whole new light.
quotes.author: Unknown

quotes.quote: Good night. May you fall asleep in the arms of a dream, so beautiful, you'll cry when you awake.
quotes.author: Unknown

quotes.quote: The stars and moon arrive just to wish you a good night. Let the light of the moon guide your dreams as you pass the night away.
quotes.author: Unknown

quotes.quote: May you dream of lovely things and to find them real.
quotes.author: Unknown

quotes.quote: As the night gets dark, let your worries fade. Sleep peacefully knowing you've done all you can do for today.
quotes.author: Unknown

quotes.quote: Good night. May you fall asleep in the comforting arms of sweet dreams.
quotes.author: Unknown

quotes.quote: The night is longer than a day for those who dream and day is longer than night for those who make their dreams come true.
quotes.author: Unknown

quotes.quote: You are the reason why I have sleepless nights. You are the reason why I tend to hold my pillow tight. And you are the reason I can't sleep without saying goodnight.
quotes.author: Unknown

quotes.quote: Sleep is the best meditation.
quotes.author: Unknown

quotes.quote: Good night. Look up, we are both under the same starry sky.
quotes.author: Unknown

quotes.quote: Goodnight, sleep tight, may your dreams take you on a wonderful flight.
quotes.author: Unknown

quotes.quote: The moon will guide you through the night with her brightness, but she will always dwell in the darkness in order to be seen.
quotes.author: Unknown

quotes.quote: Sleep is the golden chain that binds health and our bodies together.
quotes.author: Unknown

quotes.quote: Good night. Hope to meet up with you in my dreams.
quotes.author: Unknown

quotes.quote: Wishing you a good night's sleep, sweet dreams, and a morning full of love and happiness.
quotes.author: Unknown

quotes.quote: Good night, sleep tight. I will be dreaming of you with all my might.
quotes.author: Unknown

quotes.quote: The darker the night, the brighter the stars, the deeper the grief, the closer is God!
quotes.author: Unknown

quotes.quote: Night is the wonderful opportunity to take rest, to forgive, to smile, to get ready for all the battles that you have to fight tomorrow.
quotes.author: Unknown

quotes.quote: Good night. May your dreams be filled with stars and angels.
quotes.author: Unknown

quotes.quote: Good night. Look up, we are both under the same starry sky.
quotes.author: Unknown

quotes.quote: The night is the hardest time to be alive and 4am knows all my secrets.
quotes.author: Unknown

quotes.quote: Sleep is the best therapy.
quotes.author: Unknown

quotes.quote: Good night. Don't let the bedbugs bite.
quotes.author: Unknown

quotes.quote: Night is the blotting paper for many sorrows.
quotes.author: Unknown

quotes.quote: Good night, sleep tight. I will be dreaming of you with all my might.
quotes.author: Unknown

quotes.quote: The night is more alive and more richly colored than the day.
quotes.author: Vincent Van Gogh

quotes.quote: Stars can't shine without darkness. Good night.
quotes.author: Unknown

quotes.quote: Good night. Sleep awaits those of us who dare to dream.
quotes.author: Unknown

quotes.quote: The darker the night, the brighter the stars.
quotes.author: Unknown

quotes.quote: Good night. Don't forget to pray tonight because God did not forget to wake you up this morning.
quotes.author: Unknown

quotes.quote: Goodnight. May you fall asleep in the comforting arms of sweet dreams.
quotes.author: Unknown

quotes.quote: The night is filled with light when I'm with you. Good night, my love.
quotes.author: Unknown

quotes.quote: The night breeze is blowing through my hair and the soft touch reminds me of your kisses. I wish I didn't have to miss you this much.
quotes.author: Unknown

quotes.quote: Good night. May the stars guide you and the moonlight shine upon you.
quotes.author: Unknown

quotes.quote: Sleep, my love. Dream, my angel. Rest, my beautiful soul. Good night.
quotes.author: Unknown

quotes.quote: Good night. May your dreams be filled with love and happiness.
quotes.author: Unknown

quotes.quote: The night is a beautiful time to dream of a brighter future and wake up with renewed hopes. Good night.
quotes.author: Unknown

quotes.quote: Good night. May your dreams be as sweet as the kisses you gave me today.
quotes.author: Unknown

quotes.quote: The night is a time of magic. You can be anyone you want to be. Good night.
quotes.author: Unknown

quotes.quote: Good night. May your dreams be filled with adventures and your sleep be peaceful.
quotes.author: Unknown

quotes.quote: Sleep peacefully tonight, knowing that tomorrow is a new chance to make your dreams come true.
quotes.author: Unknown

quotes.quote: Good night. May your dreams be as beautiful as the love you've brought into my life.
quotes.author: Unknown

quotes.quote: The night is a canvas, and your dreams are the paint. Sleep tight and create a masterpiece.
quotes.author: Unknown

quotes.quote: Good night. May the stars guide you to a peaceful sleep and the moonlight illuminate your dreams.
quotes.author: Unknown
